skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Live Your True Life Perspectives with Ashley Berges goes into why people act the way they do and how we should react. This show is all about realizing one's own self-worth and discusses how to deal with problematic situations, such as toxic relationships and mental illness.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
